website_summaries.verdict: The benefits of stainless steel with a cap that makes it easy to drink quickly.
pros: Sport cap is BPA-free and makes it easy to drink quickly
cons: The sport cap can leak a little and does not come with a dust cap
Doesn't keep drinks as cold or hot as the insulated Klean Kanteen bottles

customer_reviews.title: Best SS bottle and a great top
customer_reviews.text: Best bottle and top on the market. I was using a stainless steel finish bottle but overtime it marked the leather seat on placed it on a grey color that was quite difficult to remove. I would prefer I slightly larger bottle, to get me through more of the day, but the next size up is too big. A buddy tells me his leaked on a plane due to pressure difference, however this top does prevents leakage provided it is pressed firmly down, under normal conditions.
customer_reviews.author: G. Conway

customer_reviews.title: A great bottle for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a water bottle and this seemed to be a good fit. I've been very pleased with it since it arrived. It does a great job of keeping cool beverages cold, but beware that it also keeps hot beverages HOT. Whatever the temperature of your beverage, the bottle will conduct it so don't clean it with hot water as you will get a nasty surprise. The Sport cap takes a bit of getting used to. I missed being able to pour water without removing the cap, but you get used to it quickly. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Knauer

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in August of 2018 based on other reviews. As of March 2019, not even a year, this bottle seems finished. I've only used the canteen for water and anytime now I fill it with water, an oily type of film appears in the canteen. Its only this canteen and try as I may to wash it over and over, it wont go away. The canteen's outer blue paint has worn away on half of it and its actually been dented by being dropped once. I am frustrated with the lack of solid canteens and the life of this particular one.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: A water bottle that is perfect for hikes or the office.
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy water bottle. Although this isn't an insulated bottle, this does keep my water relatively cool for a couple hours. The sport cap helps make for easy drinking and doesn't have any leaking problems. I purchased the 27 fl oz bottle, and it is an adequate size. At least for my water drinking needs. Anytime I go on some sort of hike, I have this water bottle with me. I haven't had any paint chipping issues. However, it should also be mentioned that these aren't dishware safe, according to the manufacturer. I haven't ran it through the dishwasher. Overall, great water bottle. I ended up purchasing another for my girlfriend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilburn

customer_reviews.title: A solution... at last!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Kleen Kanteen as a replacement for my Nalgene Tritan (which was also purchased from Amazon). Despite my repeated cleaning efforts, the Nalgene bottle readily retained stale odors. This seems to be the case for plastic bottles in general, so it is no reflection on the quality of Nalgene products. Enter the Kleen Kanteen: It has been a dream to keep clean & fresh regardless of the beverage of my choice. Food-grade stainless steel is definitely the way to go in this regard. I have relegated the Tritan to water-only use.
customer_reviews.author: Pap Squally

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I love these water bottles. We all use them in my house. They’re great, and better for the planet compared to plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: I also like the diameter of the neck which is large enough ...
customer_reviews.text: I carry the Klean Kanteen with me everywhere. It fits in the cup holder in my car and the side pouch in the bag I carry to and from school. It's always close to me while I teach. The sport cap lets me drink as I talk and prevents spills. I also like the diameter of the neck which is large enough for ice cubes.
customer_reviews.author: MJK

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but cold water leads to condensation on outside.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and works pretty well. However if you put water in it from the refridgerator it ends up with a layer of condensation on the outside as it is not lined / insulated and just one layer. This gets kind of annyong.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean and BPA free-these bottles are great kid ...
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to clean and BPA free-these bottles are great kid water bottles. The paint does tend to peel when dropped, but appearance isn't really an issue here.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Home / School / Office. Not so much for Biking.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Steel bottle. Make sure you rinse/dry a few times before using it. This will get rid of the "metally" flavor. -1 Star as the outer color coat is very delicate. will peel of at the slightest ding. Can't use it for my bike. If you are thinking for getting one for biking, get the silver one.
customer_reviews.author: Ronn Macc

customer_reviews.title: I love this water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle. It keeps my water nice and cold for hours and it's very durable. I've dropped it many times on concrete and rocks and only dented it a little.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Brannan

customer_reviews.title: Great drinking container
customer_reviews.text: Great drinking container. No bad metallic smell or taste. Air vent is not noisy as is reported in earlier versions.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Excellent water bottle. Was only a little disappointed to read in the instructions that the painted Kleen Kanteens are not dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Not old enough to fall apart!
customer_reviews.text: I usually love klean canteen products, but I was very disappointed with this one, when, after 4 months of semi continuous use, the seam along the bottom split, causing it to leak. This bottle is now useless. I am very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Javasgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice alternative to plastic water bottles. Durable, healthier, and overall recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Blevens

customer_reviews.title: Good for cycling!
customer_reviews.text: I love my kleen kanteen water bottles and this one was a great size to carry on my bicycle, in the water bottle cage.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Best reusable bottle out there
customer_reviews.text: Kleen kanteens are the only water bottle I'll drink from. Stainless steel is the best, nontoxic way to go and the sports cap is money!
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: We just love them
customer_reviews.text: KleAn kanteen at its best always. My hus just loves them. We owe this for almost 3 months now
customer_reviews.author: Tvsaran

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bottle with no after-taste
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy with no after taste. It's kinda big and tall so make sure you get the size you need. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kai88

customer_reviews.title: Paint chips
customer_reviews.text: The paint chips. I purchased this product for my children for school and it didn’t even make it through a full school year without the paint chipping. In the future Id only buy the plain silver
customer_reviews.author: JenRaMcC

customer_reviews.title: No chirp as promised!
customer_reviews.text: I walk and ride the bus everywhere I need to go. This is lightweight, attractive, and when I dropped it I was able to push the bottom of it back into place without tools.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina G.

customer_reviews.title: ... all the time -- the top closure mechanisms is great. Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time -- the top closure mechanisms is great. Very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Huge Klean Kanteen fans. Our family all has one ...
customer_reviews.text: Huge Klean Kanteen fans. Our family all has one (more than one) and the price couldn't be beat. Add Prime shipping and it was a no-brained over retail.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Still love
customer_reviews.text: This will dent if you aren't careful. Still love it
customer_reviews.author: Chiseta Kicherknife

customer_reviews.title: Love it. The silicone drink spout is quiet and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The silicone drink spout is quiet and very comfortable to use and the canteen is an improvement over the original version which I have.
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cap kind of squeaks when I drink from it. Not sure if that's normal or not.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: This is great. Serves the purpose and doesn't contain chemicals
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Serves the purpose and doesn't contain chemicals. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: PWM

customer_reviews.title: lasts for years
customer_reviews.text: I love these bottles. they are much nicer than a plastic sippy cup for the little kids and they are great for me and the older kids to take along so we don't have to buy plastic water bottles when we are out.. I much prefer to reuse than to buy the throw away kind.. not to mention we aren't drinking from plastic which can leak chemicals into the water. I have about 5 or so of these in different sizes around our house. they last a while (years) and take a beating! and if they get too beat up you can just recycle them ;)
customer_reviews.author: Erica G

customer_reviews.title: I love the sport cap as it allows me to easily ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the sport cap as it allows me to easily drink water as i'm driving without the hassle of unscrewing the bottle and risk spilling.
customer_reviews.author: jocol

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the sport lid.
customer_reviews.text: The sport top gets a white film on it if you wash with soap. Had to get the bamboo lid because the white film was bothersome. The bottle itself is tough. I have dropped it a couple times, and only had some dents in the bottom. The paint will flake off if dropped too much, but I would hope that you know this is painted. Keeps water cold for quite a while, even in hot environment. Its a good size for hiking about for a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: gabe s

customer_reviews.title: I love the bottle and lid...had to buy a couple!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these bottles and lid. Had to buy two more.
customer_reviews.author: OldeCr0m

customer_reviews.title: After only 4 wks the seal started to leak and ...
customer_reviews.text: After only 4 wks the seal started to leak and unfortunately the store does not offer warranty past 30 days. I guess I will just have to throw the bottle away. Expensive for a bottle that last only 1 mth!!
customer_reviews.author: GRR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite type of water bottle. I will continue to buy this over a camelbak. Very beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: What a Great Product, I never thought I would drink so much water!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not thirsty anymore. All I can say is, Thank You Klean Kanteen!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D

customer_reviews.title: it's not great at keeping the water cold
customer_reviews.text: It serves its purpose but does give the water a metal taste. Also, it's not great at keeping the water cold.
customer_reviews.author: Robin T Cyriac

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product would have been fine and as-advertised if not for the fact that it arrived damaged. The box was too small for the water bottle and it arrived with a dent. Because it is still functional (not on the bottom where it would cause tipping or interfering with the top fully sealing) I don't want to deal with the hassle of a return but I am not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye paint...
customer_reviews.text: The paint started to come of just after using the bottle a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good. I use it to keep water by my ...
customer_reviews.text: Good. I use it to keep water by my bed when I wake up Dry mouthed. It works great for this.
customer_reviews.author: john h wear

customer_reviews.title: Bait and Switch!
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered is not as advertised. This came with a regular screw on cap not a Sport Cap as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Genuinequality

customer_reviews.title: Kkean Kanteen sold me a FALSE dream!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a durable bottle holder, but couldn't find any quality products so after reading a review on the Klean Kanteen I thought I found the solution to my problem. My son carries his water bottle around his neck all day while at school therefore I needed something that would keep his water cold, but stop the condensation from soaking his shirt. The review stated that Klean Kanteen keeps liquids hot/cold for 10+ hrs, FALSE & that condensation would not be an issue, also FALSE.
customer_reviews.author: Scribbling Scribe

product_meta.title: Klean Kanteen Classic Single Wall Stainless Steel Bottle With Leak Resistant Sport Cap 3.0
feature_bullets: ✔ DURABLE & LIGHTWEIGHT - Lightweight SINGLE WALL water bottle design is perfect for everyday hydration when at work, on the trail or on vacation. Water bottle is lighter due to being NON-INSULATED.

✔ SUSTAINABLE - Our brushed stainless steel water bottles have no coatings inside or out and won't leach smells or flavors. We are a CERTIFIED 1% FOR THE PLANET member and proud B-CORP FAMILY OWNED company .

✔ EASY TO USE & VERSATILE - Large 1. 75 inch (44 mm) opening fits ice and is easy to fill and pour. Comes with SPILL PROOF Sport Cap 3. 0 with SAFE and soft silicone spout. COMPATIBLE with all Klean Kanteen Classic caps.

✔ HIGH QUALITY & EASY TO CLEAN - All Klean Canteens water bottles go through extensive quality control to ensure the HIGHEST QUALITY materials and construction. This means all seams, threads and stainless steel finishes are smooth and easy to clean.
✔ LIFETIME - Our lifetime STRONG AS STEEL is our promise to making a truly superior product that we stand behind in the occasion you get a product that doesn't meet our standards.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
